Author: cooldude226
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: I contributed more than 10 ETH to the ICO and I'm still waiting for a refund. I've tried to be as patient as possible but this is getting out of hand.  Like any good horror movie, things got off to a nervy start. Any momentum the ICO could have hoped to generate with its launch was stopped dead in its tracks when the website (and its pretty videos) was DDOSed, leaving people unable to contribute for some time after the official launch.  Disrespectfully to contributors, the terms of the ICO were then changed on two occasions: first by decreasing the minimum target, and second by increasing the period of time the ICO would run (notwithstanding that it was clear, at that stage, that the project wouldn't come anywhere close to reaching the soft-cap).  The refund process has been even more poorly managed than the ICO itself. Avalon/TokenLot had at least a week to prepare for the reality that refunds would need to occur but it felt like an unexpected pregnancy in Avaland when the deadline mercifully arrived after two weeks in which a total of about 3 people threw their lunch money at the project. A highlight (lowlight?) for the project in this time was the signing of convicted drug-cheat cage fighting champion, Jon Fitch, as an official sponsor. Move over Groupon  After the deadline passed, there was no official word about the refund process released in a timely fashion on the website, twitter, or on reddit. There was, eventually, a post made on this forum, albeit lacking specificity and clarity generally. The post set a deadline for refunds which wasn't honoured and foreshadows a 'phase 2 announcement', 'coming back huge', and we (apparently) 'won't want to miss out'. Needless to say, I'm giddy with excitement.  After not meeting the self-imposed timeline for refunds, there was further delay before any update was received. The team appeared to be tweeting people saying a refund would occur 'soon'.  Some contributors then received an email which advised that 'you have required action to get your refund processed' and that a refund address would need to be verified. No indication about how that verification process should occur was provided and so, causing apparent shock to the people down at Avaland, concerned contributors (presumably) provided their refund address via reply email. Despite advice that the refund would be processed 'as soon as' this information was received, this did not occur.  The next chapter in this sorry story was a further post on this forum advising that, surprise surprise, the TokenLot email address had been overloaded with refund requests and questions but that all refunds would now be processed 'at the very latest' by 10pm EST on Friday. It is left to assume that this was Friday, 6 October 2017, but why be specific when hundreds of thousands of dollars are being transacted internationally, right?  As at the current time - around 6pm EST - I have: verified the address, received no refund, and no reply to two emails sent to TokenLot. I genuinely cannot believe the Avalon squad thought they could manage a multi million dollar project which would be market disruptive.  I will sit here for the next 4 hours staring wistfully at the picture on Avalon's website of the project 'Treasurer and Financial Markets Expert' as he stares back at me with that moronic grin. Please sort this out.

Author: uN-ann
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: Announcement!  As Avalon reaches the final hours of its crowdsale - we are fully prepared and equipped to refund all donors. In the last few weeks we have made some serious behind the scenes partnerships with large, institutional donors and notable crypto advisors. These partnerships were blown away at what Avalon was able to raise without an official partnership from a large donor; as we have been counselled, we have discovered that nearly all ICOs sell out with the aid from a large partnership/donor group. This is great news for Avalon going forward, as now we have both the interest and the education from large groups going forward. We know what to do and where to allocate resources and best of all, these entities are already aware of our project.  That being said, it is important that we close out this first ICO and get everyone a refund accordingly so we can come back strong with the second chapter of the Avalon book. In the next 24 hours, please be note the following things: 1. Refunds will begin once the clock strikes zero - and may take up to 72 business hours. 2. The refund will be issued to the refund address you provided when you donated. 3. You will not have to do anything on your end to activate the refund, this will happen automatically within the next 72 hours. 4. Any refunds that are not able to be processed (incorrect refund address, no refund address provided) will be handled on a case by case basis and there is no guarantee of a refund if you did not provide the correct refund address (per the donation terms of service). We will absolutely try and solve all issues, however, it's not technically feasible to guarantee 100% resolution. The window for a manual, case by case, refund is 30 days. After 30 days, refund support will conclude.  If you foresee any technical issues with your refund, please take the time now to reach out to Tokenlot at Avalon@tokenlot.com  For all of those who supported Avalon Please remember we raised nearly 500k in cryptocurrencies with little to no large donor partnerships! Avalon will be back and we’d love to have your support for the second launch! All bounties have been recorded and will be honored if and when Avalon materializes with a token/cryptocurrency in circulation at later date. As of the end of this first crowdsale, NO (AVA) tokens will be in circulation in any capacity! The original 10million AVA tokens are safe and secure and ready for whatever comes next.  We appreciate you! We, as well as our new advisors were absolutely floored by the amount of support we received and we take this as a future barometer of Avalon’s bright future. As we prepare for the second chapter of Avalon’s funding - we will still be working daily to add new partners, vendors, ambassadors, advisors and features to Avalon. The development of the Avalon platform and business does not stop in this downtime!   In conclusion: Be sure to sign up to our newsletter, continue following our socials and bookmark our website. When we come back with the phase 2 announcement, we will be coming back huge and you won’t want to miss out.  Warm regards, The Avalon Team

Author: uN-ann
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: To our contributors, we’d like to extend our gratitude for your patience and support. For those of you here since the beginning of our ICO you may have noticed some irregularities in the initial days of the crowd-sale. Unfortunately, we were experiencing a DDOS attack heavily during the initial opening that extended periodically throughout the weekend (as well as some clerical concerns that led to incorrect listing times on notable ICO calendar sites). This complicated a crucial window in our crowd-sale’s progress. We’ve also received an incredible amount of e-mails and private messages from the community expressing their concerns about the now shortened length of the ICO window due to the aforementioned reasons.  After speaking with some newly interested political and VC advisors, they have counseled us to counter these incidents and to rectify the situation and to allow time for some very exciting announcements. Furthermore: we have elected to extend the ICO for an additional 15 days, ending officially on the 30th of September.   Despite these events, Avalon has recently breached the 1000 Ether mark!!   An exciting development in our potential coin supply:    We are slashing the potential circulating tokens!  To our valued contributors, that managed to donate early we’ve decided to reward those of you who have been here since the start; we would also like to announce that the tokens sold in this crowdsale will be the only ones ever sold! Any unclaimed tokens in Avalon’s ICO window that ends on the 30th with be slashed and burned, potentially reducing the supply and increasing the scarcity of any tokens claimed!  1. Avalon is excited that the right eyes are seeing our project! We’re dedicated to promoting businesses, assisting consumers and contributing to the implementation of digital currency in our society and this kind of responsivity is always nice to see.      2. Within the next few days Avalon will be announcing an additional large partnership/advisor!  3. We are diligently preparing the beginnings of our platform and aim to be able to display its functionality in the very near future. You can already view our demo HERE - however, a walkthrough video will be posted navigating around the user interface that will be built out around the demo. We’re excited to give you a virtual tour of our future navigation!   Additional Details:  In the rare event that the minimum threshold is not met, every single donor will have the option of receiving a full refund. Every single donor who entered their information properly has their tokens locked in escrow with TokenLot LLC and will absolutely be refunded if needed - this will never change.  You may need to clear your cache or wait some time for the counter to update on the ICO PAGE

Author: Avalon-Colin
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: For a benefits discount card like Triple A https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_Automobile_Association  There isn't much competition. By there own demographics report, they don't even target the under 35 demographic. Cryptocurrency is comprised of mostly males 19-44, with the largest demo being the 25-34 range. By marrying group purchasing power in the form of a discount card or online discount codes (to apply) at checkout and tailoring it to a demographic that our competition doesn't touch, it's a win-win. Not to mention many merchants are intrigued by the crypto space, but "scared" of what they think will be a confusing infrastructure change. Avalon circumvents this for now, using the group purchasing style model (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hkakpnrtYD4).

Author: Avalon-Colin
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: It's uncertain who or why the DDOS was present. Par for the course in crypto, I suppose. All good now though!

Author: uN-ann
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: We are proud to announce new partnerships to our community!        LocalCoinATM.com  Coming from the great white north, LocalCoinATM explodes onto Avalon's partnership list. For those outside Canada, LocalCoinATM has been increasing in size 30-40% monthly with hopes to expand their influence to additional markets. Moving forward we hope to work with our partners to make purchasing AVA safely through LocalCoinATM a possiblity.       YourMerchBuddy.com / instagram.com/merchbuddy  MerchBuddy is a full fledged print shop located in the heart of Tampa, FL. Since day one, Merchbuddy’s goal has been to provide a friendly and affordable way for our community's local businesses, musicians, events, and artists to make merchandise at the lowest price. Some of MerchBuddy’s served companies include Mobil, Exxon, Shell, Pita Pit, Circle K, and Hot Topic.  As an early perk for Avalon, starting today - MerchBuddy is willing to provide a 5% discount to anyone who mentions “Avalon” in their initial quote request!     Those of you who donated early  We are upgrading all donors prior to 8-30 to gold membership level and first to receive AVA when distribution starts. In addition, donors prior to 8-30 will be rewarded with priority access to our alpha.  More to be announced soon.

Author: uN-ann
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: ICO Update  Avalon officially begins 12:01AM UTC Friday (8pm NEW YORK CITY) HERE: https://www.tokenlot.com/crowdsale/avalon/ Tokenlot ICO Tutorial:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q4lCIkqjQ5I     AVA Token Information   1. Avalon token’s are labeled “AVA” and are digital tokens(ERC20) that exist within the Ethereum ecosystem. Many Ethereum wallets possess the ability to store and transact AVAs natively. 2. Only 10,000,000 (10 million) AVAs will ever be created (I.e. The token supply is permanently capped at 10 million). 3. The tokens will initially be distributed via a crowdfund hosted by TokenLot LLC 4. The price of the token will be finalized and represented in Ether, 24 hours before the crowdfund launch with the intention of each AVA being priced at the equivalent of 1.10USD/1.38AUD/.94Euro/1.07Franc* 5. All major cryptocurrencies will be accepted for donation, however you must receive AVA tokens in a compatible ERC20 wallet that you posses (no exchanges). 6. The minimum has been set to 2 AVA only. No advanced sign up required, but feel free to subscribe to our newsletter for additional updates: https://avalon.nu/tokens/#Subscribe 7. All participators will receive AVA 72 hours after the end of our crowdfund    No pre registration required! Additional information will be released in 24 hours.

Author: Boizinho
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: I participated on the Avalon ICO. Never got a confirmation email. Sent an email to support avalon@tokenlot.com. Received an email from them saying:  "You order is confirmed.  Order ID: XXXXXX  Sorry you did not receive a confirmation address.  Thank you,  The TokenLot Team"  Well, besides the obvious badly written text, the order ID serves no purpose since I can't use it anywhere on the website.  What's going on? It's my first ICO and I'm scared I just lost all my money. The transaction went through since it has over 1000 block confirmations on etherscan.  Could somebody help me, please?

Author: TokenLot
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: User Boizinho,  Sorry for the poorly written text. We are trying to work through the support messages in our inbox as fast as possible.  The Order ID that was provided for you is the unique identifier to your order. The blockchain transaction is basically your receipt.  As we indicated in the email, your order is confirmed. There is nothing else to worry about.  The AVA tokens will be distributed after the ICO has finished.  Thank you.

Author: Avalon-Colin
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: esprit577,  Avalon allows users to get large discounts on the stuff they already buy, by using an Avalon-specific discount code at the check out page, or by showing their Avalon card at the physical cash register (if they go to the store in real life). In addition, you can earn tokens for shopping at select retailers (sort of like a "cash back" credit card), earn tokens for participating in the ecosystem (surveys, watching ads, completing tasks) etc.  Plus any exclusive deal Avalon secures; whether its a bunch of free laptops up for giveaway, or early access to a movie premier, Beta access to an upcoming - Avalon members get it first, all under one roof.  As of right now Amazon does not accept cryptocurrency directly, but with any luck our vendor outreach team will get a chance to bend Amazon's ear one day soon.   Quote from: Disconnecting on August 08, 2017, 12:00:25 PM i want to make sure the price of one token,   is it 1.10$ each?  The price will be set in Eth, 24 hours before the crowdfund starts, at about $1.10 per Avalon token (AVA). Our ICO facilitator and escrow has the ability to accept all of the major cryptcurrencies. So if you have any leftover litecoin, or dogecoin around, feel free to use it for our ICO on August 25th.

We want everyone to have the same change to get AVA at the same time and most importantly the same price     Are you looking for any reddit moderators? that's actually a really interesting idea. Will consider opening that up to the community if there is enough interest..    Will bookmark your page, thanks! Awesome. Thanks!

Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: The tokens, get you access to the platform and your card, where the discounts are readily available. In addition, you may want to unlock (optional) "deeper" discounts, like free shipping coupons - you can do so with the tokens. Author: uN-ann
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: Announcement!  As Avalon reaches the final hours of its crowdsale - we are fully prepared and equipped to refund all donors. In the last few weeks we have made some serious behind the scenes partnerships with large, institutional donors and notable crypto advisors. These partnerships were blown away at what Avalon was able to raise without an official partnership from a large donor; as we have been counselled, we have discovered that nearly all ICOs sell out with the aid from a large partnership/donor group. This is great news for Avalon going forward, as now we have both the interest and the education from large groups going forward. We know what to do and where to allocate resources and best of all, these entities are already aware of our project.  That being said, it is important that we close out this first ICO and get everyone a refund accordingly so we can come back strong with the second chapter of the Avalon book. In the next 24 hours, please be note the following things: 1. Refunds will begin once the clock strikes zero - and may take up to 72 business hours. 2. The refund will be issued to the refund address you provided when you donated. 3. You will not have to do anything on your end to activate the refund, this will happen automatically within the next 72 hours. 4. Any refunds that are not able to be processed (incorrect refund address, no refund address provided) will be handled on a case by case basis and there is no guarantee of a refund if you did not provide the correct refund address (per the donation terms of service). We will absolutely try and solve all issues, however, it's not technically feasible to guarantee 100% resolution. The window for a manual, case by case, refund is 30 days. After 30 days, refund support will conclude.  If you foresee any technical issues with your refund, please take the time now to reach out to Tokenlot at Avalon@tokenlot.com  For all of those who supported Avalon Please remember we raised nearly 500k in cryptocurrencies with little to no large donor partnerships! Avalon will be back and we’d love to have your support for the second launch! All bounties have been recorded and will be honored if and when Avalon materializes with a token/cryptocurrency in circulation at later date. As of the end of this first crowdsale, NO (AVA) tokens will be in circulation in any capacity! The original 10million AVA tokens are safe and secure and ready for whatever comes next.  We appreciate you! We, as well as our new advisors were absolutely floored by the amount of support we received and we take this as a future barometer of Avalon’s bright future. As we prepare for the second chapter of Avalon’s funding - we will still be working daily to add new partners, vendors, ambassadors, advisors and features to Avalon. The development of the Avalon platform and business does not stop in this downtime!   In conclusion: Be sure to sign up to our newsletter, continue following our socials and bookmark our website. When we come back with the phase 2 announcement, we will be coming back huge and you won’t want to miss out.  Warm regards, The Avalon Team

Author: mademerich
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: The idea sounds nice but I don't feel it has any chance of working in the real world because there is more to group purchasing than just negotiating prices, there is also distribution etc which is much harder to organise for people that are not located in the same area.

Author: Avalon-Colin
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: Hey mademerich,  First of all, thanks for your contribution to our thread  However, generally (at least in the United States) the role of the GPO is to negotiate "best pricing" at vendors for its members, get the ink dry on the lower priced contract and step back and let the vendor handle distribution, or in some cases - more commonly in health care - there is even a 4th party involved - a dedicated distributor company (places like Cardinal, Medline, Owens And Minor) - but this varies based on the size of and spend of the parties involved.  In exchange for there service, typically the GPO will generate its revenue in either membership dues, administrative fees tacked onto member's orders, or in some cases both.  I personally have been lucky enough in my past positions to work alongside 3 of the 5 largest healthcare GPOs in the United States, and although they occasionally dip there toes in other revenue streams, the bulk of their business model relies on acting as facilitator/negotiator of best pricing, they tend to shy away from distribution and other tangible, high-over head thing, and the GPO business model is a very healthy one at present.  I'd love to discuss in further, if you want to PM me we can meet up on Skype or Telegram!   - Colin from Avalon

Author: uN-ann
Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: Yes - Our Chief of Strategic Partnerships and outreach team have been building out a vast array of vendors and business opportunities for our user base. Our reasoning for focusing on local (to us) markets is because negotiations are simpler and we can maintain quality assurance, but once we have the resources we will expand aggressively and widely.    Current Public Partnerships   CoinFlip  Coinflip is Chicago's premier Bitcoin ATM provider with over 11 locations and expanding.   BookLive  BookLive is the marketplace for instantly booking live musicians. Musicians list their prices upfront, making BookLive the fastest, easiest, most transparent way to book a live musician! BookLive offers musicians management tools so they can be on top of their business as a performer because yes, performing is not just a craft, it’s a business as well. Knowing that musicians on BookLive are professional and are self-managing makes them more attractive to book!   BlueMax Coffee  BlueMax takes pride in providing its loyal customer base with a vast array of in house roasted coffee, award winning breakfast options, and pastry goods to satisfy any sweet tooth. Bluemax supplies wholesale artisan coffee beans to businesses around the world. Bluemax is eagerly awaiting our alpha, so they can begin issuing discount cups of their highly rated coffee.    Feel free to take a look at our team qualifications and experiences:   Avalon Team Page   Additional information about our plans:   Avalon Roadmap Avalon Whitepaper    Quote from: iTradeChips on August 04, 2017, 11:06:03 PM one of those interesting projects building bridges from existing standards of doing things to the world of crypto. i was eager to look into this thread expecting bounties from campaigns as most ICO projects do. I hope the dev team will reconsider.   Thank you for the feedback iTradeChips! Feel free to shoot us a message here or at hello@avalon.nu if you have any other suggestions.

Title: *Official*[ANN][AVA] Avalon: An Elite Membership Platform
Body: Eh not too bad Avalon! Surprised by how good the videos are. The website is pretty killer too.       Its refreshing to see a group that has a solid, digestible idea that isn't wrapped up in fairy dust. Not to mention the team isn't located in the Baltics where every scam tends to operate.  Count me in
